body.name: Samsonite Aspire DLX Softside Expandable Luggage Set with Spinners (Carry-on & Medium), Black
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 10 hrs 5 mins
features: 2 PIECE SET CONTAINS: 20" Carry On (meets carry-on size restrictions for those traveling domestically and looking to stay light) and 24" Spinner (maximize your packing power and the ideal checked bag for longer trips)
10 YEAR LIMITED WARRANTY: Samsonite products are rigorously tested to ensure our products meet stringent standards. This set comes with a 10-year warranty against defects in materials and workmanship
ULTRA LIGHTWEIGHT and DURABLE 680D Polyester construction, keeping cases beautiful trip after trip
FOUR MULTI-DIRECTIONAL Spinner wheels for easy mobility, rolls upright so there is no weight on your arm or shoulder
EXPANSION ON ALL CASES for added packing capacity
Ideal for business trips, the Sefton Mobile Office Spinner features front organisational pockets – perfect for your wallet, phone and stationary – and a removable laptop sleeve
body.description: Travel with confidence. Travel with Aspire xLite. A bold fusion of lightweight construction and durability. Rugged polyester and steel wire construction create a unique combination of strength, flexibility and capacity. Aspire xLite's effortless mobility is enhanced by the use of sleek, smooth rolling in-line skate wheels and multi-directional spinner wheels.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: New Aprire DLX collection - Available only on Amazon

SMOOTH MOBILITY Dual spinner wheels provide effortless maneuverability on any surface. The custom designed hubcaps compliment the overall styling. SOFT TO TOUCH Soft-touch coated trolley grip presents a velvety-soft feeling in your hands. This gives the user an unexpected, immediate sense of quality. EASY IDENTIFICATION Elasticized pull-out ID tag provides space to write any pertinent contact information and retracts to keep your information private. SECURITY & CONVENIENCE Elasticized pull-out ID tag provides space to write any pertinent contact information and retracts to keep your information private.

MINIMALIST DESIGN The custom designed logo plate and pullers provides an elevated look by using simple forms with subtle but considered details. The hardware pair perfectly with the minimalist aesthetic to the collection. SIMPLE PACKING Smart Fix Buckles keep tie down straps out of your way during packing. The updated design features a new attachment to the case and a more streamlined shape. CARRY ON SPINNER INTERNAL FEATURES: Updated SmartFit buckles and compression straps. Removable 3-1-1 WetPak is perfect for travel size toiletries. Zippered side-wall mesh pocket allows for organized packing. Large U-shaped, zippered, mesh packing pocket. MEDIUM & LARGE SPINNERS INTERNAL FEATURES: Updated SmartFix buckles and compression straps. Removable 3-1-1 WetPak is perfect for travel size toiletries. Zippered side-wall mesh pocket allows for organized packing. Large L-shaped, zippered, mesh and lining packing pockets.
Approachable neutral color palettes of nature-inspired tones feel clean, fresh, and friendly.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this set for my SE Asia journey. This set did great and made it through 7 airports and a cruise with no damage. The handle telescopes smoothly and the 4-360 degree wheels never got stuck, rolled smoothly and stayed intact.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product roles very smoothly through the airport
reviews.reviewText: The product is very well-made just the right size and rolled very smoothly through the airport. I was very pleased with the Percha

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Where do I go to get help?
reviews.reviewText: The larger of the two suitcases came without the snap-on plastic bag. Otherwise, it’s a beautiful set. I could not find a link to simply send a message to the seller requesting the snap-on plastic bag for wet items.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is a little tall!
reviews.reviewText: We had trouble with this bag in Iceland. It was taller than their requirement. They made us check it. Most flights, no one gave us trouble about it. It is about an inch taller than our other Samsonite carry on bag.Other than that, it seems to be a very good bag, as most Samsonite bags are.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 4, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It was cheap, moves well, and looks like a great quality. My first trip with it is not for another month, but this has the look of a suitcase that’s going to last me a long time. Has a couple of organizational pockets, which I’m happy about. For the record, I received the color I ordered. I got the 25”, which (without anything in it) is about 58 linear inches, well under the 62 inches I’ll be allowed by the airline when I check it. Looks like I could even stuff the outer pockets, extending the depth, and still come within the limits. (Now, not to go over the weight limit with such a big suitcase, that will be my challenge…) Anyway, this is a good buy; I’m pleased with this purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on August 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Almost three weeks in Europe and it performed perfectly. The luggage wasn’t damaged at all after being checked. When it was brought on board it fit perfectly above. The double wheels were as smooth as silk. I’m so glad I bought this after other hard side ones were damaged.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Samsonite at warehouse be careful
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Last October I visited my sister in USA and my suitcase arrived broken, so decided to purchase one in Amazon . Found this Samsonite Aspire at very good price and as item described very good and less than 5% imperfections bought it. First item arrived night before my departure, flight was scheduled at 8:00am next morning, at the airport noticed this huge hole in the big bag like was open with a knife, I could not believe how this item was rated very good by @amazon.I contacted customer service and my options are return it, am back at Dominican Republic and return it will cost more than purchase a new one or Us25.47 refund, shame on you Amazon 👎in all my years as buyer never feel disappointed as I am today.
